long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For fantasy football players on Yahoo Sports or ESPN, use this app to easily analyze your trades for fairness. 

To use, go to the trade creator page with your trading partner. Choose your players you're thinking of trading away and receiving. Click the chrome extension icon and see the values of those players! If you update the chosen players and click again, the values will update. 

New player values are added on Tuesday afternoon ET. You can see the week of the trade values on the disclosure at the bottom, like "Updated as of end of Week 4."
